attributes.description:
The all-new CRETA comes with both a facelift and a will renewed; this SUV continues to uphold the ambition to map the way forward, offering a masterful driving experience, next-gen technology and advanced safety features. Light the way.
Enhance your experience of every trip with convenience and ingenious innovation. Stay in touch with your world and recharge all your devices with the CRETA’s wireless charger. Tune into your purpose and play your anthem for positive change on the touchscreen Infotainment system.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.title: 2016 Mercedes-Benz A-Class A 200d Urban Auto

attributes.description:
The All-New H6 GT is a blend of coupé-inspired design merged with the practical accolades of a modern SUV. The standout styling, a unique design feature of aero side skirts, enhanced visual accents, semi-Autonomous Driving, and most importantly, curb appeal makes it their most dynamic SUV to date. It offers a 2.0-litre turbo petrol engine that produces 155kW @ 6000r.p.m and 325N.m. @ 1500r.p.m. Highly spec features include:
- Electronic Parking Brake - Auto Hold - Smart Start-stop - Tilt & Telescopic Steering - Driving & Terrain Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports, Snow, Sand, Offroad, Race) - Torque on Demand AWD System -Dynamic Steering Modes (Sport, Comfort, Light) - Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering -Aerodynamic Kit: Dual Rear Spoilers, Aero Side Skirts & Sporty Rear Diffuser - Front Bumper & Rear Tailgate: Gloss Black with Carbon Fibre Visual Accents -  Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) With Intelligent Cruise, Intelligent Cornering & Traffic Jam Assist - Pre-Collision Warning & Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB Pedestrian and Cyclist) - Lane Departure Alert (ODW), Lane Keeping Assist (LKA) and Lane Centre Keeping (LCK) - Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR) - Blind Spot Detection with Rear Cross Traffic Alert And Lane Change Assist - Head-Up Display - Driver Fatigue Alert - 19 Inch Sporty Alloy Wheels with Gloss Black Finish - Auto Lift Tailgate - Panoramic Sunroof - Gloss Black Roof Rails - Rain-sensing wipers - Wireless charger - Vegan Friendly Leather Steering Wheel - Keyless Entry & Push Button Start - Heated front seats - Paddle Shift - Front 12V power outlet - Dashcam Power outlet - 10.25-inch Colour Combination Instrument - Leather seats - Sports Interior: Green Trim & Stitching With Alcantara Inserts & Carbon Fibre Visual Accents - Driver Lumber Support 2 Way Electric Support - Driver seat Electric adjust: 6 directions - 60:40 split folding rear seats - 6 Airbags: Dual + Side + Curtain
- Child Safety lock & Isofix - Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS) - Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM) - Cornering Brake Control & Brake Assist - Hill Decent & Uphill Assist -	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS) - Front Parking Sensors - Rear Parking Sensors - 360 Degree panoramic Camera - 12.3" Colour Multi-Touch Screen - Bluetooth Connectivity - 8 Speaker: 4 Trebles & 4 Bass - Carplay & Android Auto - All Windows One Touch Up/Down - Heated Exterior Mirror - Led Headlights & Taillamps - Automatic Headlights + Follow Me Home - Daytime Running Lamps (Led Integrated) - Pricing includes a 5year/ 100 000km warranty and 5 year / 60 000km service plan.

attributes.title: 2007 Volkswagen Golf 2.0 Comfortline

attributes.description:
2014 VOLKSWAGEN CARAVELLE T5 2.0 BITDI AUTO, ONLY 99 850 KM'S, FULL SERVICE HISTORY, IMMACULATE CONDITION, ONLY R 519 950.00

This is my favourite time of year, summer time means it’s almost holiday time, and I couldn’t think of a better holiday vehicle than the Caravelle, its light on fuel, drives brilliantly and has plenty of space coupled with lots of luxury. This is one of VW most reliable motors, the 2.0 TDI, this is also the 7 speed DSG gear box version. She drives like a car. Please don’t confuse this Caravelle with its siblings the Kombi and the transporter, there is no comparison, the Caravelle is the top of the range VW People carrier. 
You will not find a more gorgeous looking Caravelle on the internet at the moment, I simply love what the previous owner has done to it. 

WHAT MAKES THIS CAR SO SPECIAL? 

•	High quality full vehicle wrap (original colour is Champaign)
•	OZ aftermarket alloy rims, I must say the improvement is huge, this is what a Caravelle is supposed to look like, I’m not a fan of the original wheels to be honest. 
•	This is one of the only ones on the internet with such low mileage
•	Full service history, every service completed on time and up to date, only the last two services were not from VW.
•	Interior is like new 
•	Electric windows
•	Cruise control
•	Heated seats
•	Special tray which ads extra storage and a driving table 

This vehicle is one for the books, and I would love to buy this exact car for my family and our holidays, I can actually see myself driving through Kruger in this, or should I rather say being driven through the Kruger Park, the rear is where you want to be in this car, it’s fit for a king.
